{"id":1097665824,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 3 days","timestamp":1699853305,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1097665824/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Encode and Decode TinyURL","memory":"7.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string alphSet=\"abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ\";\n    unordered_map<string,string> urlForCode;\n\n    // Encodes a URL to a shortened URL.\n    string encode(string longUrl) {\n        string code;\n        while(urlForCode.find(code)==urlForCode.end()) {\n            random_shuffle(alphSet.begin(),alphSet.end());\n            code=alphSet.substr(0,6);\n            if(urlForCode.find(code)==urlForCode.end()) urlForCode[code]=longUrl;\n        }\n        return \"http://tinyurl.com/\"+code;\n    }\n\n    // Decodes a shortened URL to its original URL.\n    string decode(string shortUrl) {\n        return urlForCode[shortUrl.substr(shortUrl.find_last_of('/')+1)];\n    }\n};\n\n// Your Solution object will be instantiated and called as such:\n// Solution solution;\n// solution.decode(solution.encode(url));","compare_result":"","title_slug":"encode-and-decode-tinyurl","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
